attributes.action: Include Vaping in the smoking ban
attributes.background: Vaping must be made illegal, what are we breathing into our bodies, no one knows . I go to a pub that allows vaping and I'm breathing in fumes that I don't want in my system, I see school kids vaping , it's wrong,  STOP IT NOW

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you'd like vaping to be completely illegal, or whether you'd like it to be illegal in public places, in the same way as smoking tobacco. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
